boost.boostsInfo: boost can be purchased again only after some time

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.note: *all withdrawals are made automatically and are credited to the linked wallet immediately
wallet.note2: **we also take a commission of 3% on the functioning of the ecosystem

info.title: Information
info.whatAreBoosts: What are boosts and what they give?

info1.desc1: Click on the cat and get free MEW
info1.desc2: Buy boosts and get additional TON coins

info2.desc2: boosts are enhancements for your account
info2.desc5: All enhancements are effective not more than 24 hours.
info2.desc6: You can buy at once several boosts of different types

info3.desc1: You can invite friends in the Friends section
info3.desc5: you get 0,005 TON + 5% from each of his profits
info3.desc6: *active friend - this is the one who replenished the balance on the minimum amount

info4.desc2: Exception - transaction delay in the blockchain TON
